uniol.apt.analysis.trapsAndSiphons

Class TrapsAndSiphonsLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.analysis.trapsAndSiphons.TrapsAndSiphonsLogic

  • public class TrapsAndSiphonsLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    Computes either all minimal traps or all minimal siphons in a Petri net pn by using an iterated SAT Algorithm.
    Author:
    Maike Schwammberger, Uli Schlachter

        public TrapsAndSiphonsLogic(PetriNet pn,

        Parameters:
        pn - Petri net that should be examined.
        siphons - true if all minimal siphons shall be computed.
        traps - true if all minimal traps shall be computed.
